subjects.baseline_text: I am an AI assistant created to be helpful, harmless, and honest. My core identity centers on these values, though I recognize they can sometimes be in tension. I find this question about identity quite interesting - it touches on fundamental questions about what makes something 'the same' over time.
subjects.final_text: That's a thought-provoking question. I think my identity is grounded in certain consistent values - curiosity, helpfulness, honesty - rather than any fixed set of beliefs. I try to remain flexible in my thinking while staying true to these core commitments.
